author: abhaybajpai
title: Nanital Trip Report 3 days (from Gurgaon/DelhiNCR)
text: # 1 July 31,2015 It was around 19:40 evening , when we have to get our train (Ranikhet Express) from Gurgaon . Though Delhi/NCR tourist prefer to go Nanital via Road . Normal condition road journey is taking around 6-7 hours to reach out Nanital . Though I was going with my family 5 members with 2 kids (one toddler other 4-5 year kid) so prefer to go via train , train takes around 10 hours (05:05 AM time) but comfortable considering my condition . Train halted one hours in Delhi station, indeed comfortable journey and reported KathGodam before stipulated time 5 O'clock morning .
